definition.name: InputOTP
definition.description: A customizable OTP (One-Time Password) input component that provides a container for OTP digits. It wraps the OTPInput component from 'input-otp' library with additional styling and accessibility features.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the input

containerClassName.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the container

definition.visualLayout: A horizontal container that displays individual OTP input slots with consistent spacing and styling. Supports disabled state with reduced opacity.

definition.name: InputOTPGroup
definition.description: A container component that groups OTP input slots together. Provides consistent layout and spacing for the OTP input elements.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the group container

definition.visualLayout: A flex container that arranges its children (OTP slots) horizontally with centered alignment.

definition.name: InputOTPSlot
definition.description: An individual slot component for displaying a single OTP digit. Features a blinking caret animation when active and supports various visual states.

index.description: The index of the slot in the OTP sequence

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the slot

definition.visualLayout: A square container with centered text that displays a single OTP digit. Features rounded corners on the first and last slots, border styling, and an animated caret when active.

definition.name: InputOTPSeparator
definition.description: A visual separator component that displays a minus icon between OTP input slots. Used to improve readability by breaking up the OTP digits into groups.
definition.visualLayout: A centered minus icon that serves as a visual separator between OTP input slots.
